title: Art Pepper  Unreleased Art Vol 5  Stuttgart May 25, 1981(jazz)(m
description:
Art Pepper  Unreleased Art, Vol. 5  Stuttgart May 25, 1981
Label: Widows Taste
Release Date May 11, 2010
Format:Mp3@320


On Volume 5, recorded in Stuttgart, Germany, Art is locked in with his touring band of two years, headed by pianist, Milcho Leviev, who could be a willing partner, or a demon baiting Pepper and attempting to hog the limelight. Bassist Magnusson and drummer, Burnett, have no ego problems and provide rock steady accompaniment. After all this is ArtÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s show, and with his health fading slowly but spirit intact and his music being his lifeline, each volume in this excursion with Art presents treats that keeps fans coming back for more

Recording information: Stuttgart, Germany (05/25/1981)
